about_the_game:
Stack cards 🃏​ to collect food, craft equipment, build structures and defeat the dungeon ⚔️​ in this village builder roguelite. Discover new cards, gather new resources and craft new recipes every run! Combine, survive​ and thrive!

Features ⭐

• 🃏 300+ cards to discover

• 🌳 10 biomes to unlock & explore

• 👿 9 dungeons & 3 difficulties to defeat​

• ⚔️ 50+ enemies to fight

Explore biomes 🌳

Biome cards are the main source of resources each run. To start a new run you need to select which biomes you want to use. Explore them to find unique resources and customize your build the way you want!

Craft new resources 🔨

Use your cards to craft all kinds of new resources, equipment and structures to help you settle your people.

Survive 🍏

Your people have a hunger meter. Establish a nice food production to keep that bar high, otherwise they will perish from starvation. 💀

Fight enemies ⚔️

To start a new run you also need to select which dungeon/difficulty you want to play against. They will spawn all kinds of enemies in a wave based system, all depending on which difficulty you choose. Take them down, settle your people and unlock new cards to help you on your next run! All that while enjoying a soothing art style.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti (3072 VRAM); Radeon HD 6850 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200); AMD FX-4350 (4 * 4200)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 2048 VRAM; Radeon RX 460 4096 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
